channel.title: Major Surgery on Health Care Compare Documentation
channel.description: Recent content in Major Surgery on Health Care Compare Documentation

item.title: Appendectomy
item.description: Introduction In this section we will: * identify which Appendectomy procedures were excluded and why * identify which different Appendectomy subgroups were created and why If you have questions or concerns about this data please contact Alexander Nielson (alexnielson@utah.gov) Load Libraries Load Libraries library(data.table) library(tidyverse) ## Warning: replacing previous import 'vctrs::data_frame' by 'tibble::data_frame' ## when loading 'dplyr' library(stringi) library(ggridges) library(broom) library(disk.frame) library(RecordLinkage) library(googlesheets4) library(bigrquery) library(DBI) devtools::install_github("utah-osa/hcctools2", upgrade="never" ) library(hcctools2) Establish color palettes
